definition[0]: to move someone or something to a more important level or rank, or make them better than before
example[0]: Language has elevated humans above the other animals.
example[1]: Their purpose is to elevate AIDS to the top of government priorities.
definition[1]: to lift someone or something to a higher position
example[2]: Gradually elevate the patient into an upright position.
definition[2]: to increase the amount, temperature, pressure etc of something
example[3]: These drugs may elevate acid levels in the blood.
